translation: The unwise, taking pleasure in the eulogizing words of the Vedas, utter flowery speech, saying, "There is nothing else," O Arjuna.
commentary: 2.42 Yam which? Imam this? flowering flowery? Vacham speech? speak utter? unwise the unwise? Are they takign pleasure in the eulogizing words of the Vedas? Partha O Partha? Not not? Otherwise other? Is there is? It is thus? Vadinah saying.Commentary Unwise people who are lacking in discrimination lay great stress upon the Karma Kanda or the ritualistic portion of the Vedas? which lays down specific
